pos review: Value for money was excellent, room size, location was great and the hotel reception was good. Also garage parking for up to 6 motorcycles (at a push)
neg review: It's a minor point but water for boiled eggs needs to be boiling! Also a bigger toaster would help but all in all not a bad stay and value for money. Being able to arrive and drop things off would help as the check in time is 4 pm.
Tea and coffee in the room would have been good, we wake early, and would enjoy a coffee in room rather than wait till breakfast at 8 am

pos review: Breakfast was good.  Breakfast room was attractive.
neg review: There was no facility for making tea or coffee in the room. Supply of soap was meagre.
Room was very cold on arrival beds were uncomfortable

pos review: Location, and easy access to room
neg review: Very cold room in the evening, no extra blankets. not possible to turn heating on. water not hot enough at the taps, but a good shower.

Breakfast poor
Smell in entrance hall

pos review: Excellent breakfast, comfortable room, very helpful and friendly staff, top location.
